title: createEffect
contents:
mode_edit code
API > @ngrx/effects

createEffectlink

Creates an effect from a source and an EffectConfig.

createEffect<Result extends EffectResult<unknown>, Source extends () => Result>(source: Source, config: EffectConfig = {}): (Source | Result) & CreateEffectMetadata

Parameters

source Source

A function which returns an observable or observable factory.
config EffectConfig

A EffectConfig to configure the effect. By default, dispatch is true, functional is false, and useEffectsErrorHandler is true.

Optional. Default is {}.

Returns

(Source | Result) & CreateEffectMetadata: If EffectConfig#functional is true, returns the source function. Else, returns the source function result. When EffectConfig#dispatch is true, the source function result needs to be Observable<Action>.

Overloadslink

createEffect(source: () => R & ConditionallyDisallowActionCreator<DT, R>, config?: C): R & CreateEffectMetadata

Parameters

source () => R & ConditionallyDisallowActionCreator<DT, R>
config C

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

R & CreateEffectMetadata
createEffect(source: Source, config: EffectConfig & { functional: true; dispatch: false; }): FunctionalEffect<Source>

Parameters

source Source
config EffectConfig & { functional: true; dispatch: false; }

Returns

FunctionalEffect<Source>
createEffect(source: Source & (ReturnType<Source> extends EffectResult<infer OT> ? OT extends ActionCreator<string, Creator<any[], object>> ? "ActionCreator cannot be dispatched. Did you forget to call the action creator function?" : unknown : unknown), config: EffectConfig & { functional: true; dispatch?: true; }): FunctionalEffect<Source>

Parameters

source Source & (ReturnType<Source> extends EffectResult<infer OT> ? OT extends ActionCreator<string, Creator<any[], object>> ? "ActionCreator cannot be dispatched. Did you forget to call the action creator function?" : unknown : unknown)
config EffectConfig & { functional: true; dispatch?: true; }

Returns

FunctionalEffect<Source>

Usage noteslink

Class Effectslink

@Injectable() export class FeatureEffects { // mapping to a different action readonly effect1$ = createEffect( () => this.actions$.pipe( ofType(FeatureActions.actionOne), map(() => FeatureActions.actionTwo()) ) ); // non-dispatching effect readonly effect2$ = createEffect( () => this.actions$.pipe( ofType(FeatureActions.actionTwo), tap(() => console.log('Action Two Dispatched')) ), { dispatch: false } // FeatureActions.actionTwo is not dispatched ); constructor(private readonly actions$: Actions) {} }

Functional Effectslink

// mapping to a different action export const loadUsers = createEffect( (actions$ = inject(Actions), usersService = inject(UsersService)) => { return actions$.pipe( ofType(UsersPageActions.opened), exhaustMap(() => { return usersService.getAll().pipe( map((users) => UsersApiActions.usersLoadedSuccess({ users })), catchError((error) => of(UsersApiActions.usersLoadedFailure({ error })) ) ); }) ); }, { functional: true } ); // non-dispatching functional effect export const logDispatchedActions = createEffect( () => inject(Actions).pipe(tap(console.log)), { functional: true, dispatch: false } );
